comments.body:
This is where I need some help @Rahix .  No matter what I do, I can't get the `Settings::default` method to be visible to this code.  The compiler errors out on this line.  I've moved stuff around and tried many different things, I just don't understand Rust's visibility rules.  Would you mind trying to compile this example and see if there are any obvious problems?

```
 â—Œ boards/arduino-uno/examples/uno-spi-feedback.rs:
       42:19  	rustc       	error     	no function or associated item named `default` found for type `atmega328p_hal::spi::Settings` in the current scope
             	            	          	
             	            	          	function or associated item not found in `atmega328p_hal::spi::Settings`
```
